idea-plugin.name: DeepBugsPython
idea-plugin.vendor: Machine Learning Methods in Software Engineering Research Group
idea-plugin.description:
DeepBugsPython plugin provides several code inspections intended for detecting bugs and code quality issues.

Requirements

Currently available only for a 64-bit JVM.
Plugin requires model files to perform code analysis. It would be suggested to download required files when the plugin is launched for the first time.

Using inspections

  1. Select Analyze | Run inspection by name... or Code | Run inspection by name...menu item.
  2. Select the desired code inspection.
  3. Set inspection options and click OK.

Available code inspections

  • DeepBugsPython: Possibly incorrect binary operator.
  • DeepBugsPython: Possibly incorrect binary operand.
  • DeepBugsPython: Possibly swapped function arguments.

Configuration

Each code inspection uses its own threshold value to distinguish correct from incorrect code. Thresholds are configurable and could be set manually in Preferences/Settings | Tools | DeepBugsPython.
